de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.heap

Interface IntegerHeap

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IntegerMaxHeap, IntegerMinHeap

    public interface IntegerHeap
    Basic in-memory heap for int values.
    Since:
    0.5.5
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  IntegerHeap.UnsortedIter
      Unsorted iterator - in heap order.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(int key)
      Add a key-value pair to the heap
      void add(int key, int max)
      Add a key-value pair to the heap, except if the new element is larger than the top, and we are at design size (overflow)
      void clear()
      Delete all elements from the heap.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Is the heap empty?
      int peek()
      Get the current top key
      int poll()
      Remove the first element
      int replaceTopElement(int e)
      Combined operation that removes the top element, and inserts a new element instead.
      int size()
      Query the size
      IntegerHeap.UnsortedIter unsortedIter()
      Get an unsorted iterator to inspect the heap.

        key - Key
        max - Maximum size of heap

        int replaceTopElement(int e)
        Combined operation that removes the top element, and inserts a new element instead.
        Parameters:
        e - New element to insert
        Returns:
        Previous top element of the heap
